t: Gisou | Honey infused haircare from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden – Gisou EU
s: Gisou by Negin Mirsalehi is born out of a passion for honey bees and haircare. Based on a six-generation beekeeping heritage, Gisou Honey and Propolis Infused haircare is made with the finest, sustainably sourced ingredients from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden. Shop now at Gisou.com

t: We Review Gisou’s Honey-Infused Haircare (And Lip Oil!) - The Good Trade
s: November 5, 2024 - Gisou is a brand built on Negin Mirsalehi’s family tradition of beekeeping, mixed with the thoroughly modern DNA of her influencer savvy. The haircare, beauty, and skincare products can be purchased on their site, at Sephora, and even, in some cases, via Amazon.

t: Gisou, Honey-Based Hair-Care Brand, Is Coming to Sephora — Exclusive Details | Allure
s: August 11, 2020 - Gisou cofounders Maurits Stibbe and Negin Mirsalehi share the story behind their family-owned honey-based hair company. Gisou and its hero product Gisou Honey-Based Hair Oil are coming from Amsterdam to launch at Sephora.
